attributes.action: Help fight obesity by cutting the cost of healthy food....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It makes me very cross when i work hard to excercise and eat heathy when all healthier food options are far more expensive than junk food...eg, out shopping and needing a bite to eat cost me £5.40 at Marks and Spencers for a healthy "count on us" wrap and a fruit bowl, when i could have walked up the road to Macdonalds and got a meal for around £3.00.. i really think people are overweight as they struggle to afford the healthy option..
